title: Discussion of the paper �Language after Liftoff: Fed Communication Away from the Zero Lower Bound�
content: Lessons Learned and Suggested Improvements • “Dot plot” shows individual views on appropriate monetary policy  – Dots not tied to macroeconomic projections  – No information provided on identity of forecaster  – Dots do not provide obvious means to identify Committee reaction  function  – Economic outlook can change significantly between SEPs  – SEP submitted before meeting; statement reflects Committee  consensus  • Emphasize uncertainty surrounding projections—fan charts?  9
